assaytask-output

Parameter output:reference

Search by output reference (e.g., DocumentReference, Observation) on AssayTask.

ResourceTask
ExpressionTask.output.value.as(Reference)
Target ResourcesDocumentReference, Observation
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: The parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: The parameter may have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true
ChainsAllowed: identifier, subject, patient, basedOn, type
